title.rendered: HSP Roll R Cover Series 3 Dual Cab – ISUZU D-MAX GENERATION 2 MY 2012- 2019 MY20

content.rendered:
The Isuzu D-Max Gen 2 Electric Roll Top for 2013-2019 Model and MY21+ is the ultimate accessory to enhance your vehicle’s potential. Which is why The HSP Roll R Cover is Australias favorite roll top. With features such a built in LED light, advanced water drainage and the ability to open, close and pause the unit via a touch sensor, your mobile phone or even your factory remote.

HSP is 100% Australian made and owned
Open, close, and pause in any position.
Heavy-duty aluminium
Full width integrated LED Strip Light
Built-in AI technology servicing warning light
Compatible with Sports bar

Operate via touch sensor built into side rail
Alternatively, operate via factory vehicle remote
Or operate via HSP Smart App (Andriod and Apple)
And finally, operate via voice command (using SIRI)
100% Curtain retraction (maximizing tub space)
Small compact canister
Mannix black premium black finish

excerpt.rendered: HSP Roll R Cover Series 3 Dual Cab – ISUZU D-MAX GENERATION 2 MY 2012- 2019 MY20 (Including Factory A Frame Sports Bar Adapter Kit)
